snippet.title: Esh's Aurunmilla Arcade
snippet.description:
In this game, you play a character named Don Davis.  Emperor Esh, who is trying to take over the Universe Orion, has kidnapped princess Sindy.  It is your job to rescue Princess Sindy from the evil Emperor Esh.  Armed with only a sword, you must fight your way through the obstacles to rescue the princess and save the universe!
When the token is inserted, after the start button is pressed, three game modes are chosen: Low, Middle or High, which correspond to the difficulty level of the timing to be performed in relation to the score that will be obtained, illustrated on the bezel of the cabinet , and the movie begins. The game is based on the common characteristic of the lasergame genre, which is to make the right move at the right time. In this case, a small flashing asterisk on the screen will suggest the action to be performed and the fire buttons or the joystick, if the motherboard is properly configured, will flash as a further indication to the player. If the movement of the joystick / action button is done with the right timing the cutscene will continue, otherwise a death scene will be displayed.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InsertCoinArcadeOfficial/
Email: insertcoinarcade@outlook.it
Twitter: https://twitter.com/InsertCoinArcad
